meanings.definition: A colorless, volatile, flammable liquid ketone, C3H6O, used as a solvent and in the manufacture of chemicals.
meanings.sent1: I spilled propanone on the table while working in the lab.
meanings.sent2: The factory uses propanone to make various chemical products.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous scientist accidentally replaced water with propanone in the office water cooler.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity flowed like propanone, igniting new ideas in the team.
meanings.sent5: The smell of propanone lingered in the air, reminding me of my chemistry class.
